activityStream__bookFirstLesson__header: Thanks for joining the Novakid family.

activityStream__classCanceledByTeacherMe: Teacher {teacher} has cancelled the lesson of {student} scheduled for {classDate} at {classTime}
activityStream__disclaimer__text: We video record lessons for educational purposes only. You are always up to date with what your child is learning, while Novakid mentors are able to evaluate their progress. Watch the lesson videos with your child to revise the material or simply enjoy their best moments!
activityStream__disclaimer__title:
NOTE: All the material we collect is safely stored.
Only you and Novakid mentors have access to the lesson videos.
